availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John P. Fairfax (Jefferson County, Kentucky, cooper)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, cooper. Kentucky native. Son of John S. Fairfax and Margaret Ann Simpson Fairfax. Married to Frances C. Fairfax. Father of Eugene Fairfax. Cooper in Jefferson County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 214. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 80. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, La Grange, p. 6. Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), Microfilm rolls #7016130-7041803, Shelby County, 1916, file no. 24246, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky (Accessed via ancestry.com).
